intro.p: Below is a histogram showing the distribution of Aggravated Assault rates by state for 2008. (The data includes all 50 states plus the District of Columbia). Use the histogram to answer the questions below. Make sure to show all of your work and put all answers into context of the data.

image.description: Histogram showing the distribution of Aggravated Assault rates by state

intro.p: Number of Aggravated Assaults per 100,000 people in 2008

content.p: Describe the shape of the distribution of Aggravated Assault rates in 2008. Explain your answer.
What does the bar with the {{number_2}} above it represent?

outtro.p: Out of the 51 states, {{number_2}} of them had between {{answer_2}} assaults per 100,000 people in 2008.

content.p: What percentage of states had between {{assault_3a}} and {{assault_3b}} assaults per 100,000 people in 2008? Show all your work including anything plugged into a calculator. Provide your final answer in a full sentence with the appropriate context.
